hero.title: Transform Your Meal Prep
hero.subtitle: with Meze
hero.description: A comprehensive meal prepping platform that makes nutrition and meal planning effortless, leading to healthier living, better aesthetics, and often reduced food costs.

problem.title: The Problems We Solve
problem.subtitle: Meal preparation shouldn't be overwhelming. Here's what makes healthy eating so challenging:
issues: Nutrition is complex: Understanding macronutrients, micronutrients, and personal dietary needs
Meal planning is overwhelming: Deciding what to eat, when, and how much
Shopping is inefficient: Creating lists, finding ingredients, managing costs
Cooking coordination is chaotic: Especially for households with multiple people
Food waste is costly: Poor planning leads to expired ingredients and wasted money

solution.title: Our Solution: The Complete Meze Flow
solution.description: Meze streamlines the entire meal prep process through six integrated phases:

phases.title: PLAN
phases.description: Set personalized nutrition goals based on user profiles and health objectives. Create meal plans that align with household preferences and dietary restrictions.
features: Generate balanced meal combinations that meet individual macro/micronutrient targets
Schedule meal preps by date for household coordination
Account for household member preferences and dietary restrictions

phases.title: ORDER GROCERIES
phases.description: Automatically generate smart grocery lists based on planned meals. Calculate exact quantities needed to minimize food waste.
features: Integrate with grocery store APIs to place orders directly

phases.title: PREP
phases.description: Receive step-by-step prep instructions optimized for efficiency. Coordinate prep tasks among household members.
features: Batch similar preparation steps across multiple meals
Track prep progress and completion status
Provide prep time estimates and scheduling recommendations

phases.title: COOK
phases.description: Access cooking instructions with precise timing and techniques. Coordinate cooking schedules for multiple meals.
features: Offer cooking tips and technique guides
Support various cooking methods (meal prep containers, fresh cooking, etc.)

phases.title: STORE
phases.description: Provide optimal food storage guidelines for maximum freshness. Label and organize prepared meals by date and contents.
features: Track expiration dates and consumption schedules
Optimize refrigerator and freezer space utilization
Send reminders for meal consumption timing

phases.title: CLEAN
phases.description: Generate efficient cleanup checklists. Coordinate cleanup tasks among household members.
features: Provide tips for maintaining clean prep spaces
Track kitchen inventory and supply needs
Schedule regular deep cleaning and maintenance

individualFeatures.title: For Individuals
items: Personalized nutrition tracking with macro/micronutrient goals

Smart grocery list generation with cost optimization

Nutrition database with detailed food information
